Detailed Description

Class representing a 'glsl' shader program. This is a shader program that holds all of the processed shader source required for this shader program.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual void glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::addBindListener ( IShaderProgramBindListener *  bindListener)
virtual

Add a listener, which will be notified when this shader gets bound.

Parameters
bindListenerA pointer to an object implementing the IShaderProgramBindListener interface.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

virtual void glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::bind ( )
virtual

Binds this shader program as the currently active shader. Any listeners attached to this shader program will be notified when this method is called.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

virtual

Returns the bindings for this shader program. Bindings are described in the IShader.hpp file.

Returns
The bindings for this shader program.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

virtual GLint glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::getBindPointByBindingName ( IShader::BindType  bindType) const
virtual

Get the OpenGL shader bind point for the variable with bind type bindType.

If the variable with bind type bindType is found, a valid bind point value is returned. The value can be converted to an unsigned int safely.

If no binding exists for the variable with bind type bindType, -1 is returned.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

virtual GLint glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::getBindPointByVariableName ( const std::string &  varName) const
virtual

Bind the shader variable with name varName to the given bindPoint.

Parameters
varNameThe shader variable name to bind.
bindPointThe OpenGL bind point to bind the shader variable to. Bind all shader variables of the type bindType to the given bindPoint.
bindTypeThe shader variable type to bind.
bindPointThe OpenGL bind point to bind the shader variable(s) to. Get the OpenGL shader bind point for the variable with the given name varName.

If the variable with the name varName is found, a valid bind point value is returned. The value can be converted to an unsigned int safely.

If no binding exists for the variable with name varName, -1 is returned.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

const std::string& glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::getName ( ) const

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.

virtual GLint glr::shaders::GlslShaderProgram::getVertexAttributeLocationByName ( const std::string &  varName) const
virtual

Get the OpenGL shader vertex attribute location for the variable with the given name varName.

If the vertex attribute variable with the name varName is found, a valid vertex attribute location value is returned. The value can be converted to an unsigned int safely.

If no active vertex attribute exists with name varName, -1 is returned.

Implements glr::shaders::IShaderProgram.
